tests.label: duplicate_br
tests.description: A single value for a given external ID scheme (e.g. DOI value) is associated with more than one BR.

tests.label: multiple_id_values
tests.description: BRs have 2 or more values for at least one of their supported ID schemes (e.g. 2 DOIs for a single journal article).
tests.query:
PREFIX datacite: <http://purl.org/spar/datacite/>

ASK {
  ?br datacite:hasIdentifier ?id1 .
  ?br datacite:hasIdentifier ?id2 .
  ?id1 datacite:usesIdentifierScheme ?scheme .
  ?id2 datacite:usesIdentifierScheme ?scheme .
  FILTER (?id1 != ?id2)
  FILTER (?scheme != datacite:issn)
}

tests.label: duplicate_agent
tests.description: Multiple foaf:Agent entities have the same ID value for any given scheme (e.g. different authors have the same ORCID).

tests.label: multiple_manifestations
tests.description: There are BRs that are embodied in multiple fabio:Manifestation entities.

tests.label: br_in_multiple_venues
tests.description: There are BRs that (wrongly) appear to be contained in different venues (e.g. journals).
